Set tooltip

Source: R/columns.R
set_tooltip.Rd

Set tooltip

Usage

set_tooltip(widget, column)

Arguments

widget

(tabulator) A tabulator widget.

column

(character): The column the formatter is applied to.

Value

tabulator htmlwidget

Examples

tabulator(airquality) |>
  set_formatter_traffic_light("Ozone") |>
  set_tooltip("Ozone")
